title: alfanjhon
author: alfanjhon
content: Hi BinanciansStart your new year by joining our referral campaign. Come on, invite your friends, family and community to join Binance and you have the chance to win a total prize pool of 50 Million BIDR.Campaign period: 2 January 2022 - 15 January 2022.Activity DetailsUsers wishing to participate in this campaign must submit their data on the <SURVEY FORM> to be eligible for this activity. And the levels of prizes that can be won are as follows:Registration process  15,000 BIDRsMaximum 10 referees.Every referee who completes the registration process will be rewarded 15,000 BIDR each. And each referral is only entitled to a maximum of 150,000 BIDR during the registration process.The total amount of prizes that can be won in this campaign is 50 Million BIDR.Scenario:Winners will be prioritized based on the timestamp of filling out the form. The earlier you fill out the form, the bigger the chance to win. The participant registration form is only open from the date (Monday, January 2, 2023 00:00 - Sunday, January 15, 2023 23:59).Example 1: User A filling out the 1st form succeeded in bringing 10 new registrants. User A will get 150,000 BIDR. The remaining reward quota is 49,850,000 BIDR.Example 2: User B filling out the 2nd order form succeeded in bringing 5 new registrants. User B will get a total of 75,000 BIDR. The remaining reward quota is 49,775,000 BIDR.Example 3: User C filling out the 3rd order form succeeded in bringing 8 new registrants. User C will get 120,000 BIDR. The remaining reward quota is 49,730,000 BIDR.And so on until the prize quota runs out. There is no maximum number of winners.Terms and Conditions:Only registered users as Indonesian users can participate in this campaign.Valid for Standard Referrals only. And registered referees must also be Indonesian users to be calculated.This activity is carried out on a first come first serve basis.Prizes will be distributed within a maximum of 3 weeks after the activity is completed. We will send your prize directly to your wallet distribution.Participants are required to complete this <SURVEY FORM>. This form is only open from the date (Monday, January 2, 2023 00:00 - Sunday, January 15, 2023 23:59).The Binance ID of the participant has been entered when logging in to fill out the form.Binance reserves the right to cancel or modify any Activity or Activity Rules at our sole discretion.Registration links : https://www.binance.me/id/activity/referral-entry/CPA?fromActivityPage=true&ref=CPA_00DR2VIUSF
